data.title: Welcome to Stark County, Ohio
data.text:
Judge Patricia Ann Delaney was re-elected to a third, six-year term on the Fifth District Court of Appeals, commencing February 11, 2019. Judge Delaney was first elected in 2006 and re-elected in 2012. She currently serves as the Court’s Presiding Judge. In 2012 and 2017, she also served as the Court’s Presiding Judge. She also previously served as the Court’s Administrative Judge in 2021 and 2019.

Judge Delaney currently serves as the Secretary for the Ohio Court of Appeals Judges Association. She also serves on the Judicial Advisory Group, a statewide group of judges who work with the Ohio Lawyers Assistance Program to help judges with professional and personal issues.

Judge Delaney was born and raised in Cleveland, Ohio and received both undergraduate (1987) and law (1990) degrees from the University of Toledo.

She served as an Ohio Assistant Attorney General in the Environmental Enforcement Section, Staff Attorney for Judge Beverly Pfeiffer of the Franklin County Court of Common Pleas and was in private practice at the Columbus law firm of Vorys Sater Seymour and Pease. Immediately prior to joining the bench, Judge Delaney served as a Columbus Assistant City Attorney for nine years, practicing civil litigation in both state and federal courts.

In 2013, Judge Delaney was appointed to the Ohio Supreme Court’s Commission on the Rules of Superintendence and served as Chair of the Commission from 2016-2018. Judge Delaney is past chair of the Bylaws Committee for the Ohio Court of Appeals Judges Association. She also is a member of the Coshocton Business and Professional Women’s Association; the Ohio Women’s Bar Association, the Delaware County Bar Association; the Stark County Bar Association and the Ohio State Bar Association.

She is admitted to practice before the U.S. District Court, Northern and Southern Divisions of Ohio; the U.S. Sixth Circuit Court of Appeals and the U.S. Supreme Court.

Judge Delaney has served by assignment on the Ohio Supreme Court and several other Ohio Courts of Appeals. She has been a speaker for the Ohio Judicial College, teaching courses on evidence, judicial fairness, and new judge orientation.

Judge Delaney is married to Patrick Delaney, and has four grown children and seven grandchildren. The Delaney family resides in Delaware County.
